Bisa means “can” in Indonesian. It symbolizes possibility, creativity, and freedom of expression.

Bisa Studio is a Maison d’edition and Creative Studio that breaks the linear way of thinking and embraces curiosity. Our mission is to create objects with stories, born from a synergy of shared visions, cultures, histories, traditions and evolutions. Our art is ideas, their beauty is incidental. 

We seek diverse people, thoughts, and ideas and collaborate with creatives from around the world to co-design “pièces passionnantes” – pieces with soul. We bring tradition techniques to life in a new form. From a traditional weaver in Turkey to a natural silk dyer in Bali to a multidisciplinary artist in Paris, our strength is in our community. We co-create with fluidity and look past fixed notions and rigid frameworks. We delight in objects evocative of our shared past, a history preserved in wood, clay, iron, or cloth. Traditions restored, traditions created. Pieces that fill our world. e.
